sideNote: This site is created to help beginners start learning, exploring, and getting to know more about this field. You'll find basic information, tips, and things you might encounter on your journey. We know that interface design is a vast field, and there's no single "right" or "wrong" way to approach it. Everyone has their own way that they discover and develop with time.
